docker buildx build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.32.2 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:<VERSION>-k8s.v1.32.2 --platform=linux/<ARCH> --push -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
docker buildx build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.31.6 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:<VERSION>-k8s.v1.31.6 --platform=linux/<ARCH> --push -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
docker buildx build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.30.10 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:<VERSION>-k8s.v1.30.10 --platform=linux/<ARCH> --push -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
